title: Inside Facebook's Election War Room
description:
The world’s largest social network has assembled an elite team. Its mission: to root out malicious activity, fake news and election interference. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg TV anchor Emily Chang about the work being done inside Facebook's War Room.
FOLLOW UP
 Emily's latest report: Why Has Facebook Created a War Room?
You can follow Emily at: @emilychangtv
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
